name: ext_R5_GraphDefinition_node
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.GraphDefinition.node for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents GraphDefinition.node from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GraphDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: Optional Extension Element - found in all resources.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
